contentObject.content: PCT LTD (OTC Pink: PCTL ). Paradigm Convergence Technologies Corporation has always been committed to helping the ecosystem by providing Hydrolyte®, a low toxicity, environmentally-conscious disinfectant that kills 99.9999% of pathogens, and Catholyte, a potent non-toxic, environmentally-safe cleaner and degreaser. Both products are created from naturally-occurring salt minerals (pure salt), water, and low-voltage electricity using PCT Corp.’s special electro-chemical activation (electrolyzing) process. Our products are used in businesses including hospitals and school systems as well as in private homes.
A study conducted by the United States Geological Survey in 2002 found detergent traces in 69% of streams, and 66% of streams contained disinfectants across the USA.

The Environmental Working Group monitors 50,000 water utilities, which serves 280 million people throughout the USA. They have found more than 250 chemicals in America’s drinking water. More than 160 of the contaminants found have no governmental limits set for them. Dozens of the other contaminants found are at levels that are legal, but still pose health risks according to scientists. 40,000 water systems in America have been found with contaminants linked to cancer – that is more than 80%!

It’s important to make sure the ingredients of any cleaner/disinfectant are easily biodegradable and break down quickly in the wastewater treatment facilities. Both Hydrolyte® and Catholyte Free® rapidly breaks down entirely to salt water and leaves no harsh chemical residues.

Celebrate Earth Week with PCT Corp April 18, 2022 through April 22, 2022. A special package of 1 gallon of Hydrolyte® disinfectant and 1 Gallon of Catholyte Free® cleaner for $80.00. For each two-gallon case sold, PCT will donate $20.00 to the Environmental Working Group. This offer includes free shipping in the continental US for Earth Week only! Please call 843-390-7900, ask for “Orders” and mention “Earth.”
PCT would like to thank our customers for their dedication to help save the planet by reducing toxic chemicals.

PCT LTD ("PCTL") focuses its business on acquiring, developing, and providing sustainable, environmentally safe disinfecting, cleaning, and tracking technologies. The company acquires and holds rights to innovative products and technologies, which are commercialized through its wholly owned operating subsidiary, Paradigm Convergence Technologies Corporation (PCT Corp). The Company established entry into its target markets with commercially viable products in the United States and now continues to gain market share in the U.S. and U.K.
